drinkName.name: Space Gin Smash
drinkName.about: Famed British bartender Angus Winchester likes to mix up this fruity tipple on rainy days.

mix.how: In a shaker, muddle the mint, lemon, grapes, apple and simple syrup.
Add the gin and fill with ice.
Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh cracked ice.
Garnish with an apple fan, a mint sprig and a grape.
